meanings.definition: To employ jointly or together with others.
meanings.sent1: The company coemploys two friends in the same department.
meanings.sent2: The team coemploys interns during the busy season.
meanings.sent3: The robots coemploys humans to help with tasks.
meanings.sent4: The garden coemploys bees to pollinate the flowers.
meanings.sent5: The school coemploys teachers to educate the students.

meanings.definition: To be employed jointly or together with others.
meanings.sent1: She coemploys with her sister at the bakery.
meanings.sent2: The siblings coemploys at the family-owned business.
meanings.sent3: The cats coemploys with the dog to catch mice.
meanings.sent4: The birds coemploys with the wind to soar high in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The actors coemploys in the same play at the theater.
